greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = index of the row where n is located in array A278505.
comment: Ordinal transform of A278539 (most likely, but hinges on that also the columns of A278505 are strictly growing).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10707
Index entries for sequences related to the Josephus Problem
formula: If n = A000960(k), a(n) = k, otherwise a(n) = number of the round in which n is removed in the Flavius sieve.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 23 2016
